name: Random Number Generator 1-10
description:
Greetings!


This is my first ever attempt at creating an interactive game/activity in Figma. The result is a 1-10 random number generator. You can use it for anything you'd like!


Thanks to Gleb (@g) for the prototyping idea, you never cease to amaze me. All credit for the idea of the interactive part goes to him. While I built it myself, he was the original curator.


What you can use this for

  • Team related activities/games
  • Deciding on something
  • Just to have fun/play around
  • Further your own prototype


(I did all my own designs. It's not my favorite UI, but it's simple enough and it works well.)


In the future, I hope to build more like this. If you have any ideas, please feel free to leave them in the comments. Constructive criticism and on topic discussion is also welcome. I hope you enjoy this prototype a whole lot!


Cheers!


[How to contact me via Figma]
